name: liquefied petroleum gas, import from Europe | liquefied petroleum gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4593/documentation

This dataset represents the import of a refined petroleum product from Europe (without Switzerland) into Switzerland.

This activity starts with the supply of the finished petroleum product from petroleum refinery operation in Europe without Switzerland.

This activity covers the transport requirements for import of the finished petroleum product to Switzerland.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products
